messages.author: stevenjb
messages.text: This and the two callbacks below seem generic enough to be defined with DBusMethodCallStatus?

messages.author: stevenjb
messages.text: I'm confused about what this method does. It looks like it should return whether or not we can attempt ownership, but in that case shouldn't the callback pass a bool? Or does it tell cryptohome that it is OK to attempt ownership, in which case we should rename this to something like SetTpmCanAttemptOwnership.

messages.author: hashimoto
messages.text:
On 2012/07/26 17:19:52, stevenjb (chromium) wrote:
> This and the two callbacks below seem generic enough to be defined with
> DBusMethodCallStatus?

Sounds good, will do in a separate patch.

messages.author: hashimoto
messages.text:
On 2012/07/26 17:19:52, stevenjb (chromium) wrote:
> I'm confused about what this method does. It looks like it should return whether
> or not we can attempt ownership, but in that case shouldn't the callback pass a
> bool? Or does it tell cryptohome that it is OK to attempt ownership, in which
> case we should rename this to something like SetTpmCanAttemptOwnership.
Looks like your latter guess is correct. (http://git.chromium.org/gitweb/?p=chromiumos/platform/cryptohome.git;a=blob;f=service.cc;h=e27e2f087da4e96c315a49b052dea1f0d2e146a6;hb=refs/heads/master#l954)
This method is named badly from the beginning, I think it should be renamed to something like MyabeStartInitializeTpm().
Anyway, I'm using the name "TpmCanAttemptOwnership" because the Cryptohome service is providing the method with this name.
If we are going to rename this method, we should also rename Cryptohome service's method name too.

messages.author: stevenjb
messages.text: OK, I see. That is definitely badly named. Can you at least comment what it does and/or include the link?

messages.author: hashimoto
messages.text:
On 2012/07/30 22:24:38, stevenjb (chromium) wrote:
> OK, I see. That is definitely badly named. Can you at least comment what it does
> and/or include the link?

Added a comment.

messages.author: stevenjb
messages.text: Should we consider adding this where DBusMethodCallStatus is defined? Haven't we defined this same function elsewhere?

messages.author: hashimoto
messages.text:
On 2012/07/26 17:19:52, stevenjb (chromium) wrote:
> Should we consider adding this where DBusMethodCallStatus is defined? Haven't we
> defined this same function elsewhere?
We're having the exactly same function in cros_network_functions.cc.
Will do in a separate patch.
